quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因词根拆分（backpack+ing）错误理解为“整理背包”，或因形近词“packing”（打包）误导为“打包行李”。
quiz_item.sentence: During their summer vacation, they went **backpacking** through the mountains of Nepal, staying in cheap hostels and carrying all their supplies in large backpacks.

option.definition: 背包旅行（徒步长途旅行）
